thread.title: Shah Rukh Khan Has A Personalised Jersey Of This Popular Football Team
thread.title_full: Shah Rukh Khan Has A Personalised Jersey Of This Popular Football Team

author: Sukriti Gumber
title: Shah Rukh Khan Has A Personalised Jersey Of This Popular Football Team

persons.name: shah rukh khan  shah rukh khan

text:
Sukriti Gumber Jan . 9 . 2017 Shah Rukh Khan 
Shah Rukh Khan is a huge sports fanatic. From owning a cricket team in the IPL to being a Football fan, it’s a known fact that the superstar is a sports lover. Speaking of which, Spanish giants, Real Madrid happens to be his favourite Football team. 
Real Madrid’s Facebook page recently posted a photo of SRK holding the team’s white jersey. Not just that, his initials adorn the back of the jersey with the number 555. Check it out!
